title: Demon Baby: Hell on Heels
description: WHEN GREGORMMAALECH WAS MURDERED, HIS DAUGHTER INHERITED A DARK ARSENAL OF GOETIC ARCANE TOOLS, ANCIENT JOURNALS, A CRUMBLING INNER CITY SANCTUM, AND A BOOK F PACTS WITH 17 GREATER AND LESSER DEMONS OF THE INFERNAL HIERARCHY. MAALECH WAS ONE OF THE TOP 3 MAGICIANS OF THE 20TH CENTURY. HIS DAUGHTER, TALIAN, ISN'T. BUT NOW, HELL-BENT FOR REVENGE ON HER HER FATHER'S KILLERS, TALIAN MAALECH MUST STEP INTO THE MASTER DEMONOLATOR'S SHOES, AND TRY TO HARNESS THE SUPHUROUS EVIL THAT WOULD RATHER SHRED HER IN HELL THAN SERVE HER ON EARTH.
author: Steve Fastner
